lead_paragraph: BAY--Eugene A. The Statue of Liberty-Ellis Island Foundation's board and staff mourn the loss of our beloved friend and board member, Gene Bay. Mr. Bay served the Foundation with distinction for three decades, chairing and sitting on a number of committees and actively fundraising for our many projects. His dedicated leadership, wonderful personality and delightful sense of humor were an inspiration. We all simply loved him. Our heartfelt condolences to his wife DeDe and family. Lee Iacocca, Founding Chairman; Albert Bellas , Chairman; Stephen Briganti, President and CEO 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BAY, EUGENE A

snippet: BAY--Eugene A. The Statue of Liberty-Ellis Island Foundation's board and staff mourn the loss of our beloved friend and board member, Gene Bay. Mr. Bay served the Foundation with distinction for three decades, chairing and sitting on a number of committees and actively fundraising for our many projects. His dedicated leadership, wonderful personality and delightful sense of humor were an inspiration. We all simply loved him. Our heartfelt condolences to his wife DeDe and family. Lee Iacocca, Founding Chairman; Albert Bellas , Chairman; Stephen Briganti, President and CEO 1/3
